医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新发现揭示突变 RAS 基因如何驱动肿瘤生长美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的研究人员及其合作者发现了一种新方法，在癌症中常见突变的 RAS 基因可能会驱动肿瘤生长，超出其在细胞表面信号传导中的众所周知的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/New-discovery-reveals-how-mutant-ras-genes-drive-tumor-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/New-discovery-reveals-how-mutant-ras-genes-drive-tumor-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f8ae54e-7047-451a-ab4c-247232e089de Mon, 11 Nov 2024 17:46:00 -0500 New discovery reveals how mutant RAS genes drive tumor growth
Pin1 的靶向降解显示出胰腺癌治疗的希望在药物发现中，靶向蛋白质降解是一种选择性消除致病蛋白质的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Targeted-degradation-of-Pin1-shows-promise-for-pancreatic-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Targeted-degradation-of-Pin1-shows-promise-for-pancreatic-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99df5185-a380-421e-bb60-1126660ed151 Mon, 11 Nov 2024 17:41:31 -0500 Targeted degradation of Pin1 shows promise for pancreatic cancer treatment
研究发现虚弱会增加人患痴呆症的风险昆士兰大学研究人员领导的一项国际研究发现，身体虚弱会增加人患痴呆症的风险，但早期干预可能是预防的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Frailty-increases-a-persons-risk-of-dementia-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Frailty-increases-a-persons-risk-of-dementia-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95918ada-1778-4efc-824b-82cae7db6078 Mon, 11 Nov 2024 17:34:10 -0500 Frailty increases a person's risk of dementia, study finds
歧视可能导致黑人女性产后体重滞留研究人员无法解释为什么黑人患者在分娩后体重保持或增加的可能性是白人患者的两到三倍，即使孕前体重和妊娠体重轨迹相当。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Discrimination-may-drive-postpartum-weight-retention-in-Black-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Discrimination-may-drive-postpartum-weight-retention-in-Black-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58a09f00-af1f-4d71-882a-410285029f70 Mon, 11 Nov 2024 17:29:35 -0500 Discrimination may drive postpartum weight retention in Black women
研究人员开发出具有治疗多种癌症潜力的新抗体乌普萨拉大学和瑞典皇家理工学院的研究人员开发了一种新型精准医学——抗体，有可能治疗多种类型的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Researchers-develop-new-antibody-with-potial-to-treat-several-types-of-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Researchers-develop-new-antibody-with-potial-to-treat-several-types-of-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=143690d5-0502-47a6-9f39-42d8f57b81c8 Mon, 11 Nov 2024 17:23:58 -0500 Researchers develop new antibody with potential to treat several types of cancer
VANCE 试验标志着实体瘤 T 细胞治疗的里程碑有史以来最大规模的实体瘤T细胞治疗临床试验已经结束，预示着精准T细胞治疗的新时代。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/VANCE-trial-marks-milestone-in-t-cell-therapy-for-solid-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/VANCE-trial-marks-milestone-in-t-cell-therapy-for-solid-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26c6b678-f16d-44ea-8998-0a8aca1967e9 Mon, 11 Nov 2024 17:10:06 -0500 VANCE trial marks milestone in t cell therapy for solid tumors
历史红线继续影响受影响社区的艾滋病毒治疗杜兰大学的一项新研究发现，历史上基于种族的贷款做法仍然影响着今天的健康，将这些歧视性政策与受影响社区内有效艾滋病毒治疗的延误联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Historical-redlined-continues-to-affect-HIV-treatment-in-affected-communities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Historical-redlined-continues-to-affect-HIV-treatment-in-affected-communities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=465d571f-6ece-475a-a83e-f6b0f21d4fbc Mon, 11 Nov 2024 17:00:36 -0500 Historical redlining continues to affect HIV treatment in affected communities
研究表明哮喘与儿童记忆缺陷有关加州大学戴维斯分校的一项新研究表明，哮喘与儿童记忆困难有关，哮喘早期发作可能会加剧记忆缺陷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Study-links-asthma-to-memory-deficits-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Study-links-asthma-to-memory-deficits-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4459554c-8f65-4e48-8a2e-0e78b824762e Mon, 11 Nov 2024 16:54:35 -0500 Study links asthma to memory deficits in children
新的遗传模型提供了对乳腺癌转移的见解密歇根州立大学研究人员研究乳腺癌的新模型可以帮助科学家更好地了解癌症转移的原因和地点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/New-genic-model-offers-insights-into-breast-cancer-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/New-genic-model-offers-insights-into-breast-cancer-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57cad13a-0888-4259-98bc-902ea90b4baf Mon, 11 Nov 2024 16:46:44 -0500 New genetic model offers insights into breast cancer metastasis
心脏骤停后 10 分钟内进行旁观者心肺复苏可增加生存机会和大脑恢复非专业施救者（旁观者）越早在家中或公共场合对心脏骤停的人（心脏骤停后 10 分钟）开始心肺复苏 (CPR)，挽救该人生命并保护其大脑功能的机会就越大。根据将于 2024 年美国心脏协会复苏科学研讨会上发表的初步研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Bystander-CPR-within-10-minutes-of-cardiac-arrest-increases-survival-chances-and-brain-recovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Bystander-CPR-within-10-minutes-of-cardiac-arrest-increases-survival-chances-and-brain-recovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5a3ea5f-311d-417a-8715-ef8f838605cd Mon, 11 Nov 2024 14:58:29 -0500 Bystander CPR within 10 minutes of cardiac arrest increases survival chances and brain recovery
